title: Blog with Next
description: The goal of the blog is to allow the creation of new posts dynamically, using MDX files where each created MDX file automatically generates a route.

title: Full Stack Dashboard
description: Dashboard built with Next.js featuring User CRUD, Authentication, Encryption, Different User Permissions, and Data Retrieval on Access

title: Tech Vantage - Corporate Website
description: Final Project for Internet Programming developing a functional system with requirements like Form Registration and Data Printing

title: Todo List - MERN Stack
description: POC - Todo List made to perform the 4 CRUD operations using a non-relational database and includes a complete Login System

title: Landing Page Meow Café
description: Project proposed by Codante where the goal was to bring the Meow Café design to life, transforming it into a functional and responsive page without using frameworks.

title: API - MedAgenda
description: Med Agenda is a project developed for managing a medical clinic, including the management of patients, doctors, and appointments.

title: API - FastAPI
description: API built with FastAPI with the goal of creating a robust and modularized API in Python, later reused in my Scientific Initiation.

title: Landing Page Insove Medical Healthcare
description: Landing Page created using TailwindCSS designed for medical clinics, aiming to provide a good experience for doctors and patients.

title: Name Finder
description: Final Project for Internet Programming where the goal was to create a name search engine consuming an API on the backend, processing the data, and displaying it on the frontend with a search history.

title: Google Keep Clone
description: Google Keep clone proposed to be done without frameworks, allowing you to make notes, pin notes, duplicate notes, and export notes to a CSV file.

title: API - Node Fastify
description: API built with the goal of performing CRUD operations using a relational database.

title: Habit Tracker
description: Med Agenda is a project developed for managing a medical clinic, including the management of patients, doctors, and appointments.
